short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily view product review videos of the products you want to buy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Product Video extension provides you browsing videos about the products of you wanted to buy on your favorite shopping site. When you visited the product detail page you will be able to see Product Videos link near the product title, then click and see the videos on youtube.com.
